DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if apnea (the stopping of breathing) occurs in patients undergoing undergoing monitored anesthesia care (MAC) for vitreoretinal surgery
DOC.brief_title: Rates of Apnea in Patients Undergoing Vitreoretinal Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Patients undergoing vitreoretinal surgery will be monitored during the procedure to determine if they stop breathing. This study is observational in nature and no interventions will be made.
DOC.criteria: patients having vitreoretinal surgery under monitored anesthesia care patients having vitreoretinal surgery without monitored anesthesia care
